scripts.push:git: clear && git config core.ignorecase false && branch="$(git symbolic-ref -q HEAD)" || "dev" && branch=${branch##refs/heads/} && branch=${branch:-HEAD} && echo Pushing to Branch "$branch" && echo Please type your commit message && read msg && clear && git add . && git commit -m "$msg" && git push origin "$branch"
scripts.sync:live: echo Starting File Sync && rsync --ignore-errors -avz --delete --exclude-from=".syncignore" -e "ssh -p22 -i ~/.ssh/id_ed25519" * $npm_package_config_ssh_user@$npm_package_config_ssh_server:$npm_package_config_ssh_folders_live && echo Finished File Sync
scripts.push:live: clear && echo Starting Live Push && yarn vite build && yarn sync:live && ssh -i ~/.ssh/id_ed25519 $npm_package_config_ssh_user@$npm_package_config_ssh_server "cd $npm_package_config_ssh_folders_live && /usr/bin/php74 -d memory_limit=-1 -f composer.phar update && /usr/bin/php74 artisan cache:clear && /usr/bin/php74 artisan migrate && rm -rf public/storage && /usr/bin/php74 artisan storage:link" && echo Finished Live Push
